mutants.code:
def reverse_array(array):
    start = 1
    end = len(array) - 1
    while start < end:
        (array[start], array[end]) = (array[end], array[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return array

def reverse_array(array):
    start = -1
    end = len(array) - 1
    while start < end:
        (array[start], array[end]) = (array[end], array[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return array
